Definition.name: DataStats

Documentation.returns: a data set of information on each work item
Documentation.content: Information about the datasets. Without details the range for the x and y (independent and dependent) columns. Note that a column of all zero values cannot be distinguished from a missing column. When details are requested, the cardinality, minimum, and maximum values are returned. A zero cardinality is returned when the field cardinality exceeds the Constants.limit_card value.

param.name: field_details
param.desc: Boolean directive to provide field level info

Definition.Signature: DATASET(Types.Data_Info) DataStats(DATASET(Core_Types.NumericField) indep, DATASET(Core_Types.DiscreteField) dep, BOOLEAN field_details=FALSE)

Documentation.returns: a data set of information on each work item
Documentation.content: Information about the datasets. Without details the range for the x and y (independent and dependent) columns. Note that a column of all zero values cannot be distinguished from a missing column. When details are requested, the cardinality, minimum, and maximum values are returned. A zero cardinality is returned when the field cardinality exceeds the Constants.limit_card value.

param.name: field_details
param.desc: Boolean directive to provide field level info
